workflow.name: Streamline Content Creation with GPT-4o and One-Click Human Review Approvals
workflow.description:
## Overview
Automate AI content creation from request to approval. While AI writes quickly, human review often delays delivery‚Äîand multiple tools create workflow gaps and version confusion. This unified solution streamlines the entire process, enabling teams to produce quality content at scale with transparent tracking.

## How it works
Submit a form with your topic, tone, and keywords. GPT-4o generates the content and assigns a quality score (0‚Äì100). The reviewer receives an email to approve, edit, or reject the draft‚Äîall actions are automatically logged in Google Sheets for tracking and audit purposes.

## Setup steps
1. Import the workflow JSON file into n8n
2. Connect your OpenAI and Google account credentials
3. Update three variables in the workflow: SHEET_ID (your Google Sheets document ID), REVIEWER_EMAIL (recipient for review notifications), and WEBHOOK_URL (for form submissions)
4. Test the workflow with a sample submission

### Workflow Stages
1. Submit a form with topic, tone, and keywords.
2. GPT-4o generates content and assigns a quality score (0‚Äì100).
3. Reviewer receives an email to approve, edit, or reject the draft.
4. All review actions are automatically logged in Google Sheets with timestamps and approval status.


## Requirements
n8n v1.0+ instance, OpenAI API key with GPT-4o access, and Google Workspace with OAuth2 credentials.

## Custom options
Choose model: gpt-4o, 4o-mini, or 3.5-turbo. Adjust score weights: Readability 40%, Keywords 30%, Length 30%.

## Key benefits
Generate drafts 99% faster and approve content 95% quicker. Centralized tracking ensures clarity and accountability.

workflow.name: AI Content Generation via OpenAI GPT-4o with Human Review and One-Click Approval Workflow

parameters.formDescription: Submit your content requirements and let AI create the first draft. You'll review and approve before publishing.

parameters.text:
=You are an expert content writer specializing in {{ $json.contentType }}.

**Assignment:**
Create engaging {{ $json.contentType }} content about: {{ $json.topic }}

**Target Audience:** {{ $json.audience }}

**Tone:** {{ $json.tone }}

**Word Count Target:** {{ $json.wordTarget }} words

**Requirements:**
{{ $json.requirements }}

**Instructions:**
1. Research the topic thoroughly
2. Write in the specified tone consistently
3. Include compelling headlines/hooks
4. Add relevant examples and data points
5. Include a clear call-to-action
6. Optimize for readability (short paragraphs, subheadings)
7. If blog post, include SEO-optimized meta description

**Format:**
Title: [Compelling title here]

Meta Description: [If applicable]

[Main content body]

CTA: [Call to action]

---

Begin writing now:

parameters.responseBody:
=
‚úÖ

Content Approved!

The content has been marked as approved and is ready for publishing.

Request ID: {{ $json.query.id }}

Close This Tab

=
‚úèÔ∏è

Changes Requested

The content has been marked for revision. The team will be notified.

Request ID: {{ $json.query.id }}

=
‚ùå

Content Rejected

The content has been rejected. It will not be published.

Request ID: {{ $json.query.id }}

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
